sentences.en: A dentist may decide to extract the tooth to prevent recurrent trouble.
sentences.cn: 牙医可能会决定拔掉那颗牙，以免反复发作。

sentences.en: Banks have brought trouble on themselves by lending rashly.
sentences.cn: 银行滥放贷款给自己惹来了麻烦。

sentences.en: Cracks, bulges, crumbling pointing and damp patches mean trouble.
sentences.cn: 裂缝、凸起、剥落的勾缝和湿斑都意味着存在问题。

sentences.en: His captaincy of the team was ended by mild eye trouble.
sentences.cn: 他由于患轻度眼疾而不再担任队长一职。

sentences.en: hitching a lift is asking for trouble.
sentences.cn: 想免费搭便车是自找麻烦。

sentences.en: Might I trouble you for a drop more tea?
sentences.cn: 能否麻烦您再添一点茶？

sentences.en: Perhaps I shouldn't say that — I might get into trouble.
sentences.cn: 也许我不该讲那些话——我可能会惹来麻烦。

sentences.en: Recent stock market losses point to trouble ahead.
sentences.cn: 最近股市的下跌预示着未来将有麻烦。

sentences.en: Riot police are being deployed throughout the city to prevent any trouble.
sentences.cn: 正在全城部署防暴警察以防止发生骚乱。

sentences.en: She dropped out after 20 kilometres with stomach trouble.
sentences.cn: 20公里后她因胃痛而退出了比赛。

sentences.en: She was fitted with a pacemaker after suffering serious heart trouble.
sentences.cn: 她患上严重的心脏病后安装了心脏起搏器。

sentences.en: The couple laughed off rumours that their marriage was in trouble.
sentences.cn: 夫妻两人对他们婚姻出现问题的谣言一笑置之。

sentences.en: The pilot told the control tower that he'd run into technical trouble.
sentences.cn: 飞行员报告机场控制塔他遇到了技术问题。

sentences.en: The trouble with her is she needs her daily fix of publicity.
sentences.cn: 她的问题在于她每天都想要在媒体上曝一曝光。

sentences.en: There are recognised black spots in marriages which can lead to trouble.
sentences.cn: 婚姻中有一些公认的容易引发问题的雷区。

sentences.en: Would you shut up, please! I'm having enough trouble with these children!
sentences.cn: 请你闭嘴！这些孩子已经够我烦的了.

sentences.en: Your non-conformist ways will probably get you into trouble.
sentences.cn: 你特立独行的行事方式可能会给自己惹来麻烦。

sentences.en: youths take a cocktail of drink and drugs before going out to look for trouble.
sentences.cn: 酒和毒品混用过以后，这群年轻人就出去惹是生非了。

words.tran_cn: 动乱的，不安的；混乱的；困惑的
麻烦的；讨厌的；使人苦恼的
捣乱者，闹事者；惹麻烦的人
故障检修工；解决纠纷者；解决麻烦问题的能手

phrases.tran_cn: 困难重重；无穷无尽的麻烦

phrases.phrase: a trouble shared is a trouble halved
phrases.tran_cn: (谚)苦恼让人知晓，负担一半减少
使自己或他人陷入困扰之境
给别人添麻烦,麻烦人家,打扰人家[亦作 put someone to (或to the)trouble]
v. 与...有纠纷；有...的病痛
在监禁中；处于不幸中；处困难中

trans.tran_cn: 问题，麻烦，困难，苦恼，疾病，疼痛，故障，纷争，骚乱，不便
使烦恼，使忧虑，麻烦，打扰，费心，劳神，使疼痛
trans.tran_en: to say something or ask someone to do something which may use or waste their time or upset them

trans.tran_cn: 使苦恼； 使忧虑； 使麻烦
trans.tran_en: if a problem troubles you, it makes you feel worried or upset
